notice.ch: 與CI7065合班上課．不在分發優先順序內學生請拿密碼卡

department.ch: 遙測科技碩士學位學程
department.en: Master of Science Program in Remote Sensing Science and Technology

remark.ch: 與CI7065合班上課．不在分發優先順序內學生請拿密碼卡

goal.ch: 本課程經由課堂講授以及實習操作學習進階的GIS理論及分析方法。具備針對實務或研究計畫能自行發展具有潛力甚或具可行性的GIS分析技術。本課程將使用GIS軟體進行教學，學生將學習如何使用GIS軟體來進行空間資料的處理及相關分析。
goal.en: “This class uses lecture materials and exercises to help students to develop an advanced understanding of GIS. The goal is to help students: 1. to learn how to collect, analyze and display GIS data; 2. to apply GIS theories and practice GIS software in a self-established project.“

outline.ch: 本課程藉演講與實作，修課學生必須完成每週實習以及作業，包含文獻閱讀與GIS實作。課程將會有一次課堂測驗以及學期計畫。計畫必須於期末前進行口頭報告並繳交書面報告。
outline.en: “Students should complete assignments, including readings and lab exercises. We will have one in-class exam and students are expected to complete a group project, which will be presented by an oral presentation and a short written report.“

textbook.ch: “Chang, K. T., 2016, Introduction to Geographic Information Systems, 8th edition, McGraw-Hill: New York.“
textbook.en: “Chang, K. T., 2016, Introduction to Geographic Information Systems, 8th edition, McGraw-Hill: New York.“

gradMethod.en: Will be discussed in the first lecture
